frontMatter.title: Wednesday Club Night at Claremont Stadium
frontMatter.summary: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Wednesday Club Night. Whether you're great at badminton or just starting, we‚Äôve got a court for you. Everyone‚Äôs welcome!

prev.title: Join Us at Claremont Stadium for a New Badminton Season!
prev.summary: The new badminton season is almost here! Join us at Claremont Stadium for some exciting games. Whether you're a pro or a beginner, there's space for everyone. Don't miss out!
